mention.text: Snowden , who fled to Hong Kong and then Moscow last year
Russia , an authoritarian country where he has taken refuge
an authoritarian country where he has taken refuge
Wednesday he was not under the control of Russia 's government
his first with a U.S. television network
Snowden - who said he wants to return to the United States -
this is a man who has betrayed his country , who is sitting in Russia , an authoritarian country where he has taken refuge
his one-year asylum in Russia , which expires on Aug. 1
